0.title: Samara. The SaaS solution to all-size businesses
0.summary: Samara is a cloud-based web app provided as SaaS for all-size businesses to automatize their finances, processes and inventories without needing complex technological architecture. Just a device and internet access for enjoying all the benefits of Samara.

details.p1: This app was created from scratch, the draft was made on Figma using the mobile-first principles. After it was developed and deployed using NextJS with Context API and TailwindCSS. This app also uses a first-party API to connect data and other services provided by the he-llo team.
details.p3: Skills: Trouble-shooting, UX research, teamwork, project management.

1.title: Class Schedules Automation app
1.summary: Web app made for a specific school to automate class schedules and fix time distribution for teachers between classes using Operations Research and Process Optimization with Linear programming.

details.p1: This app was made based on Bootstrap components. The project starts with the need of a particular school to fix their scheduling troubles, optimizing their processes and implementing optimization algorithms with Operations Research.
details.p3: Skills: Trouble-shooting, project management, Operations Research

2.title: he-llo Webpage
2.summary: The Webpage for our own company to offer IT services as Graphic Design, Web Development, Data Analysis and more.

details.p1: This page was made from scratch using Tailwind CSS, HTML, React and Next. The purpose to this page was to be SEO optimized and provide a responsive design for our customers devices.
details.p3: Skills: Project management, UX research, teamwork.
